name: 武儒绘卷 - 九五至尊
name_original: 武儒绘卷 - 九五至尊
description:
'Scroll of wuru and No.95 zizun' is interact novel game, In the game you play a civilian, tells the story of emperor gone with ups and downs do eventually.

Game Features

  • Simple interactive fiction, content have 20 minutes
  • May change the game speed, read and archive file regular functions
  • There are many achievements can get
